DOC.brief_summary: This study design provide long term safety data TRI476 child inadequately-controlled partial seizure . This study conduct patient complete core study CTRI476B1301 . Blinding maintain transition dose adjustment phase extension study . All patient treat TRI476 dose adjustment phase onwards . The purpose study confirm TRI476 adjunctive therapy safe .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Safety Tolerability TRI476 ( Oxcarbazepine ) Children With Inadequately Controlled Partial Onset Seizures
DOC.criteria: Patients complete doubleblind treatment phase core study ( B1301 ) . A parent/legal guardian must present give write consent patient enrol trial . Patients consent must obtain use assent document accord patient age . Females childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test Week 8 core study B1301 . Patients medical ineligibility enter extension , assess investigator site . Patients participate core study , complete ( prematurely discontinue ) Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
